title: Inside Lisa Faulkner and John Torode's very special wedding day

They famously met on Masterchef back in 2010 so Lisa Faulkner and John Torode's wedding day was always going to be about the grub.

And after sharing a sneak peek of their wedding photos, more gorgeous details have emerged about the pair's special day.

From the spectacular marbled wedding cake to the star studded wedding list, we take a look at autumn wedding of the year!

The couple exchanged their vows at the glamorous setting of Aynhoe Park in Banbury, Oxfordshire on Thursday in front of family and friends.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: restorationcake/Instagram)

(Image: aynhoepark/Instagram)

Aynhoe Park, a Grade I listed 17th-century country house rebuilt after the English Civil War, offers a bespoke wedding service which can be a "classical fairy tale or a story of rock n roll decadence - or a bit of both."

The house also boasts a team of excellent chefs who can rustle up a bespoke menu for the lucky couple.

While it isn't known which wedding breakfast the couple opted for their cake was shared on Instagram by creator Charlotte White.

(Image: charliecondou/Instagram)

(Image: charliecondou/Instagram)

(Image: aynhoepark/Instagram)

She captioned the snap" "Loved making this marbled Wedding Cake, festooned with sugar roses, wildflowers, and eucalyptus. Delivered to the stunning Aynhoe Park yesterday."

Blushing bride Lisa, 47, wore a gorgeous satin white wedding dress with a demure lace neckline and cinched waistline to frame her figure perfectly.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The Holby City actress carried a bouquet made up of roses, floral sprigs and greenery. John styled out a button hole to match her floral arrangement.

(Image: SWNS)

(Image: SWNS)

The MasterChef judge, 54, and Holby City actress held a stunning wedding decked out with lavish decorations and extravagant features.

The couple celebrated with their close friends and family at the wedding, where her 13-year-old daughter Billie was her best woman.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

During the big day, wedding guests offered eagle-eyed fans a teased glimpse inside the swanky wedding and intimate reception party.

It was quite the crowd in attendance including Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda Holden .

Both Lisa and John took to their own social media accounts to document the big day.

(Image: Instagram)

Lisa wrote: "The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks!

"Apologies in advance. Yesterday I married the man of my dreams @johntorodecooks and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love.

"Thank you @aynhoepark we didn’t want to leave! #allyouneedislove ."

John also posted: "Officially married the girl of my dreams yesterday @lisafaulknercooks what a day!! Thank you @aynhoepark ."
description: The pair married in Aynhoe Park in Banbury, Oxfordshire, in front of a star-studded audience
